content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Production System
Located around (-13, -50)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill for iron ore
- Input chest collecting iron ore
- Input inserter feeding furnace
- Stone furnace for smelting
- Two output chests for iron plates
- Output inserter moving plates to chest

### Copper Production System 
Located around (-28, -61)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill for copper ore
- Input chest collecting copper ore
- Input inserter feeding furnace
- Stone furnace for smelting
- Output chest for copper plates
- Output inserter moving plates to chest

ERROR TIPS

### Entity Placement Errors
- Check for existing entities before placing new ones at a location
- Remove misplaced entities before trying to place new ones at same location
- Ensure required items are in inventory before attempting placement

### Technology Requirements
- Research required technologies before attempting to craft items that need them (e.g. assembling-machine-1 requires automation technology)
- Check recipe requirements and technology prerequisites before attempting complex crafting chains

### Resource Management
- Ensure all required ingredients are available before starting crafting chains
- For complex items requiring multiple ingredients, craft prerequisite items first

### Automation System Maintenance
- Keep burner-powered entities supplied with coal to maintain operation
- Monitor input/output chests to prevent backlog or shortages

NAMESPACE

Functions:
- place_entity(): Places entities on the map, fails if location occupied or missing items
- extract_items(): Removes items from entities like chests/furnaces
- craft_item(): Creates new items, requires prerequisites and ingredients

Variables:
- output_chest: wooden-chest
- output_inserter: burner-inserter
- copper_drill: burner-mining-drill
- iron_plate: item
- copper_plate: item
